clientAlgoOrderId.description: Client algo order Id as assigned by the user

algoOrderTag.description: An optional tag for this order, max string length: 64

side.description: BUY/SELL, not required for POSITIONAL_TP_SL or TP_SL order

positionSide.description: BOTH for one way mode; LONG or SHORT for hedge mode;  Only applicable to perpetual instruments

quantity.description: Order quantity, not required for POSITIONAL_TP_SL order

visibleQuantity.description: The order quantity shown on orderbook;  for POSITIONAL_TP_SL order, visibleQuantity applies directly to the child orders
